ovdesc.p: This application is used for Corporate customer to initiate requests for issuance of guarantees through Internet Banking. When the request for issuance is approved by the Bank, the values from the fields of this application will be mapped to the corresponding fields in MD.DEAL and the system will create the MD.DEAL record and place it in IHLD, for the bank user to complete the process of issuance of guarantee.

Specifies the status of the amendment request.
Dropdown - Allowed values are - With Bank_With Customer_Approved_Rejected.
Allowed for bank user to input, mandatory for Interent banking enabled customers.
System default to “With Bank”;, when corporate authoriser submits the request to bank.
Override generated when the current status selected by the bank user is the same as the previous status.
User updated mandatory field at bank side for CIB enabled customers and system updated at CIB side
Following are the allowed values:
“With Customer”, if request pending with customer for clarifications – To be updated by Bank user.
“Approved” – if request is approved by Bank user – to be updated by bank user.
“Rejected” – if request is rejected by Bank user – To be updated by Bank user.
“With Bank” – System updated value at CIB side.

If value selected is “Approved”, then MD.DEAL (amendment) record is created in INAU status after MD.IB.REQUEST record is authorised. The online service, OFS.MESSAGE.SERVICE must be running for the system to create the MD.DEAL record.
If value selected is “Rejected”, then IB.BK.TO.CUST field is mandatory.
If value selected is “With Customer”, then IB.BK.TO.CUST field is mandatory.
